titleStmt.title: Certain letters, evidencing the Kings stedfastness in the Protestant religion: sent from the Princess of Turenne, and the ministers of Charenton, to some persons of quality in London.
titleStmt.author: Turenne, Anne de La Tour d'Auvergne, Vicomtesse de.
Gaches, Raymond, d. 1668.
Daillé, Jean, 1594-1670.
Drelincourt, Charles, 1595-1669.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Thomas Newcomb for Gabriel Bedell, and Thomas Collins, and are to be sold at their shop at the Middle Temple gate in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Letters in French and English, and in Latin and English, in parallel columns.
Reproductions of the originals in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery (Early English books) and in the British Library (Thomason tracts).

place.placeName: their shop at the Middle Temple gate in Fleetstreet
